parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Required. Configuration to interpret the item type T.

parameters.name: getItemKey
parameters.description: Required. Returns the unique identifier for an item.

parameters.name: getItemPrice
parameters.description: Required. Returns the unit price of the item.

parameters.name: getItemTax
parameters.description: Optional. Returns tax per unit. Default: 0.

parameters.name: getItemDiscount
parameters.description: Optional. Returns discount per unit. Default: 0.

returnValues.name: items
returnValues.description: The raw array of items in the cart.

returnValues.name: addItem
returnValues.description: Appends a new item to the cart.

returnValues.name: removeItem
returnValues.description: Removes an item by its key.

returnValues.name: updateItem
returnValues.description: Updates specific properties of an item.

returnValues.name: getTotal
returnValues.description: Calculates total: Subtotal + Tax âˆ’ Discount.

returnValues.name: getDetails
returnValues.description: Returns a derived list of aggregated items with math details.

returnValues.name: clear
returnValues.description: Removes all items from the cart.
